snippet: While Representative Steve King’s constituents are beginning to question his tactics and his focus on the health law, they support his core commitment to cutting the size of government.
abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column talks with voters in Iowa's Fourth Congressional District, whose representative Steve King is one of most outspoken advocates for blocking Obamacare, in effort to find out what people thought of government shutdown and threat of default; reports that while King's constituents are beginning to question his tactics and his focus on the health law, they still support his core commitment to cutting size of government.
lead_paragraph: While Representative Steve King’s constituents are beginning to question his tactics and his focus on the health law, they support his core commitment to cutting the size of government.

headline.print_headline: In Rural Iowa, Spending, Not the Shutdown, Raises Worry
headline.main: In Rural Iowa, Spending, Not the Shutdown, Raises Worry

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
